trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element which enables <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> elements (i.e. a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>) to be embedded (hosted) in flow content.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de conteúdo do fluxo de nível de bloco que lhe permite <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> elementos (ou seja, um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref>) ser incorporado (alojado) no conteúdo do fluxo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element (i.e. a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) may be embedded directly in flow content by enclosing it in a BlockUIContainer (see example below).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>elemento (ou seja, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) pode ser incorporado diretamente no conteúdo de fluxo por envolvente-lo num BlockUIContainer (consulte o exemplo abaixo).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: An BlockUIContainer may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: Mais do que um diretamente pode alojar um BlockUIContainer <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an BlockUIContainer may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o elemento subordinado alojado por um BlockUIContainer pode alojar subordinados do seu próprio.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância nova, vazia do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref> classe, efetuando uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> objeto como o conteúdo inicial do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> objeto especificando o conteúdo inicial do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> hospedada o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>diretamente pode alojar mais do que um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o elemento subordinado alojado por um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>pode alojar subordinados do seu próprio.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], wrapping a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> is equivalent to setting that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as the value of the Child property.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], encapsulamento um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>num <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>é equivalente à definição que <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>como o valor da propriedade subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>
